title: Textile, 1951-167-8-a,b, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
description: Part of cover or curtain, of cotton striped in blue and white with printed designs in stripes. In blue, a vase with flowers; in white, groups of dogs alternating with flowers. Trimmed with red and white cotton fringe. Two breadths each 29" wide.
